comments:
Double clicking on a .java file gives me the error "Unable to create part".  A 
window with red text telling me to check the .log file appears rather than the 
text file I want.  Sometimes, closing the window and trying again to open the 
file fixes the problem until the next time I start eclipse.  Reverting to RC1 
seems to fix this problem.

I have included the .log file, but I am not sure if it will help.

.log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Jul 09, 2004 18:30:41.359
!MESSAGE Unable to find Action Set: org.eclipse.jdt.junit.JUnitActionSet

Works for me using R3.0. Looks like a VM bug or some buggy code provided by an
additional plug-in.

What VM are you using? Does it work if you disable the JIT (-Djava.compiler=NONE
or -Xint)?
